document.full_text: state investigators on tuesday said the police were seeking to detain a 28-year-old moscow man in the killing of eduard chuvashov, a judge who was despised by skinhead groups for his tough sentences in ethnic killings.
document.title: europe: russia: moscow man sought in judge's killing
lines_and_colors: state investigators on tuesday said the police were seeking to detain a 28-year-old moscow man in the killing of eduard chuvashov, a judge who was despised by skinhead groups for his tough sentences in ethnic killings.
